Text: Education at SothebysDear Collector Sothebys Institute of Art in London offers unique courses in all aspects of fine and decorative arts with special access to Sothebys auction house From a oneyear Decorative Arts Diploma to a full BA programme and four MA courses we provide internationally recognised quality education for those looking to develop their expertise or seeking careers in the art world Sothebys Institute students learn about art by examining it first hand All of our courses are led by experts in their field and include visits to museums galleries and private collections in the UK and elsewhere in Europe New courses in include MA in East Asian Art Parttime MA in Contemporary Art Foundation Course in Asian Art Jewellery Courses in London New York and Geneva To view our prospectus in PDF format please visit our website at cgibinfloyeDXeWCoOXBAtQAG For further information please email us at Sincerely Diana Keith Neal Chairman of Sothebys Institute of Art Senior Director Sothebys Europe Director Sculpture and Works of Art Department Sothebys London Your Email is in our mailing list To update your profile and change your selections please visit sothytesturlhtmcgibinprofileyeDXeWCoOX To unsubscribe please click here previewunsubscribehtml
